DOC.brief_summary: Background/Aims : Verify effect glycemic index ( GI ) body composition , inflammatory metabolic marker concentration . Methods : Eighteen type 2 diabetic , ( age 42.4 + 5.1 year , BMI 29.2 + 4.8 kg.m-2 ) randomly allocate low GI ( LGI ) high GI ( HGI ) group . High low GI meal provide laboratory twice day 30 consecutive day . The meal consume free living condition subject instruct select food present GI value correspond allocate group . Body composition ( body mass index , body fat percentage , waist circumference waist-hip ratio ) , inflammatory marker concentration ( interleukin-6 , tumor necrosis factor-alpha , high molecular weight adiponectin , ultra-sensitive C-reactive protein fibrinogen ) metabolic marker ( glucose , insulin , total cholesterol , HDL cholesterol , free fatty acid , triglyceride fructosamine ) assess baseline intervention . Food intake monitor study . The criterion statistical significance P < 0.05 .
